name: Monkey Domain
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Animal and Terrain Domains/Monkey Domain

sections.body: The balanced wisdom, skill, agility, and playfulness of the monkey are the model for your spiritual discipline.
sections.name: Granted Powers

sections.body: You gain a monkey familiar. Your effective wizard level for this ability is equal to your druid level. Your druid level stacks with levels from other classes that grant familiars when determining the powers of your familiar.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Animal and Terrain Domains/Monkey Domain/Familiar
sections.name: Familiar

sections.body: As a free action, you may add a competence bonus equal to half your druid level (minimum of +1) on one Acrobatics, Climb, Disable Device, or Sleight of Hand check. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
sections.name: Monkey Athletics
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Animal and Terrain Domains/Monkey Domain/Monkey Athletics

sections.body: At 6th level, you can use the Disable Device and Sleight of Hand skills at a range of 30 feet. Working at a distance increases the normal skill check DC by 5, and you cannot take 10 on this check. Any object to be manipulated must weigh 5 pounds or less. You can only use this ability if you have at least 1 rank in the skill being used.
sections.name: Ranged Legerdemain
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Animal and Terrain Domains/Monkey Domain/Ranged Legerdemain

sections.body: 1st—beguiling gift, 2nd—spider climb, 3rd—cacophonous call, 4th—freedom of movement, 5th—summon nature's ally V (dire ape or girallon only), 6th—confusion, 7th—animal shapes (apes and monkeys only), 8th—clenched fist, 9th—foresight.
